instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3476 Running solw, fan spin increases, freezes so can't run ASD
threads.message:
Hi.

Board was liquid damaged I think but can't remember now, it's been sat in a draw for a while and all corrosion completely removed.
Powers on fine, battery is detected, keyboard detected, trackpad detected. Fan increases gradually to speeds that sound almost dangerous. Tried booting into ASD a couple times but just freezes.
No idea what to do

threads.title: 820-3476 Running solw, fan spin increases, freezes so can't run ASD
threads.message: Need to boot EFI version of ASD not the OS version.
